caption.center: Fuchs v. Scripps Howard Broadcasting Co.

opinion.posture: Hamilton App. No. C-050166, 2006-Ohio-5349. Reported at 113 Ohio St.3d 1414, 2007-Ohio-1036, 862 N.E.2d 843.
opinion.opinion_text:
Reconsideration of Prior Decisions On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
MOYER, C.J., PFEIFER and O'DONNELL, JJ., dissent.Page 1517
